description: Tools for testing and managing plugins.

params.name: testmodule
params.description: Provide a plugin name to run all tests for a plugin, 'all' to run all known tests, or plugin:module to run the tests in a specific module. If you omit this, the last tests run will be run again.

provides.name: plugin add
provides.description: Add a file or directory in your Bespin files as a plugin.

provides.name: plugin remove
provides.description: Remove a plugin (deletes installed plugins, just removes the reference to 'add'ed plugins).

provides.name: plugin install
provides.description: Install a plugin from a given URL

params.name: plugin
params.description: name (if in Gallery) or URL where the plugin can be found

provides.name: plugin upload
provides.description: Upload a plugin you've created to the plugin gallery.

params.name: pluginName
params.description: name of the plugin to upload

provides.name: plugin gallery
provides.description: List the plugins in the Plugin Gallery

provides.name: debug syntaxcontexts
provides.description: Displays the active contexts at the insertion point

provides.name: debug whosonfirst
provides.description: Displays the first responder and key pane after 3 seconds

provides.name: pluginURL
provides.description: a valid URL (http/https) from which to install a plugin
